modelIdentification.name: SISO-STD-001.1-2015 - Real-time Platform Reference Minefield FOM Module
modelIdentification.purpose: The RPR FOM supports interoperability for real-time, platform oriented defense simulation.
modelIdentification.description: The Minefield FOM module relates to the simulation of minefields at both an aggregate and individual level simultaneously. In addition, it implements the two modes defined for exchanging the data of individual mines within minefields, depending on the number of mines.

reference.identification: Real-time Platform Reference Synthetic Environment FOM Module
Standard for Guidance, Rationale, and Interoperability Modalities for the Real-time Platform Reference Federation Object Model (RPR FOM) SISO-STD-001-2015 10 August 2015
IEEE Standard for Distributed Interactive Simulation - Application Protocols IEEE Std 1278.1-1995 September 21, 1995
IEEE Standard for Distributed Interactive Simulation - Application Protocols IEEE Std 1278.1a-1998 19 March 1998

objectClass.name: Minefield
objectClass.semantics: An area of ground or water containing mines laid with or without a pattern.

attribute.name: ActiveStatus
attribute.semantics: Specifies the active status of the minefield

attribute.name: ForceIdentifier
attribute.semantics: Identifies the force to which the minefield belongs

attribute.name: Lane
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not the minefield has an active lane

attribute.name: MinefieldAppearanceType
attribute.semantics: Specifies the appearance information needed for displaying the symbology of the minefield

attribute.name: MinefieldIdentifier
attribute.semantics: Uniquely identifies this minefield instance in association with the federate's site and application

attribute.name: MinefieldLocation
attribute.semantics: Specifies the location of the center of the minefield

attribute.name: MinefieldOrientation
attribute.semantics: Specifies the orientation of the minefield, with Euler angles

attribute.name: MinefieldType
attribute.semantics: Specifies the minefield type

attribute.name: MineTypes
attribute.semantics: Specifies the type of each mine contained within the minefield

attribute.name: PerimeterPointCoordinates
attribute.semantics: Specifies the location of each perimeter point, relative to the minefield location

attribute.name: ProtocolMode
attribute.semantics: Specifies the mode (Heartbeat or Query Response Protocol) being used to communicate data about the minefield

attribute.name: State
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not the minefield has been deactivated

objectClass.name: MinefieldData
objectClass.semantics: The MinefieldData object class provides data about collections of mines within a minefield on an individual mine basis.

attribute.name: GroundBurialDepthOffset
attribute.semantics: Specifies the offset of the origin of the mine coordinate system with respect to the ground surface

attribute.name: Fusing
attribute.semantics: Specifies the primary and secondary fuse and anti-handling device for each mine in a collection of mines

attribute.name: MineEmplacementTime
attribute.semantics: Specifies the real-world (UTC) emplacement time of each mine in a collection of mines

attribute.name: MineEntityIdentifier
attribute.semantics: Identifies the mine entity identifier; the MineEntityID in conjunction with the MinefieldID form the unique identifier for each mine

attribute.name: MinefieldIdentifier
attribute.semantics: Identifies the minefield to which the mines belong

attribute.name: MineLocation
attribute.semantics: Specifies the location of the mine relative to the minefield location for each mine in a collection of mines

attribute.name: MineOrientation
attribute.semantics: Specifies the orientation of the center axis direction of fire of the mine, relative to the minefield Coordinate System for each mine in a collection of mines

attribute.name: MineType
attribute.semantics: Specifies the type of mine for the collection of mines contained within the MinefieldData object

attribute.name: NumberTripDetonationWires
attribute.semantics: Specifies the number of trip detonation wires that exist for each mine in a collection of mines

attribute.name: NumberWireVertices
attribute.semantics: Specifies the number of vertices for each trip wire of each mine in a collection of mines

attribute.name: PaintScheme
attribute.semantics: Specifies the camouflage scheme/color of the mine

attribute.name: Reflectance
attribute.semantics: Specifies the local dielectric difference between the mine and the surrounding soil

attribute.name: ScalarDetectionCoefficient
attribute.semantics: Specifies the coefficient to be utilized to insure proper correlation between detectors located on different simulation platforms

attribute.name: SensorTypes
attribute.semantics: In QRP mode, specifies the requesting sensor types which were specified in the minefield query whereas in Heartbeat mode, specifies the sensor types that are being served by the minefield

attribute.name: SnowBurialDepthOffset
attribute.semantics: Specifies the offset of the origin of the mine coordinate system with respect to the snow surface

attribute.name: ThermalContrast
attribute.semantics: Specifies the temperature difference between the mine and the surround soil in degrees Centigrade

attribute.name: WaterBurialDepthOffset
attribute.semantics: Specifies the offset of the origin of the mine coordinate system with respect to the water surface

attribute.name: WireVertices
attribute.semantics: Specifies the locations of vertices in a trip wire

objectClass.name: MinefieldObject
objectClass.semantics: A mine, mine weapon, mine row, mine strip, mine lane, mine marker or minefield, defined as an areal environment object.

attribute.name: BreachedStatus
attribute.semantics: Specifies the breached appearance of the minefield object

attribute.name: MineCount
attribute.semantics: Specifies the number of mines in the minefield

objectClass.name: MinefieldLaneMarkerObject
objectClass.semantics: A minefield lane marker showing a cleared lane through a specific minefield, defined as a linear object.

attribute.name: SegmentRecords
attribute.semantics: Specifies a minefield lane marker showing a cleared lane through a minefield

interactionClass.name: MinefieldData
interactionClass.semantics: Provides information on individual mines contained within a minefield

parameter.name: GroundBurialDepthOffset
parameter.semantics: Specifies the offset of the origin of the mine coordinate system with respect to the ground surface

parameter.name: Fusing
parameter.semantics: Specifies the primary and secondary fuse and anti-handling device for each mine

parameter.name: MineEmplacementTime
parameter.semantics: Specifies the real-world (UTC) emplacement time of the mine

parameter.name: MineEntityIdentifier
parameter.semantics: Identifies the mine entity identifier; the MineEntityID in conjunction with the MinefieldID form the unique identifier for each mine

parameter.name: MinefieldIdentifier
parameter.semantics: Identifies the minefield to which the mines belong

parameter.name: MineLocation
parameter.semantics: Specifies the location of the relative to the minefield location

parameter.name: MineOrientation
parameter.semantics: Specifies the orientation of the center axis direction of fire of the mine, relative to the minefield Coordinate System

parameter.name: MineType
parameter.semantics: Specifies the type of each mine contained within the minefield interaction

parameter.name: NumberOfRecords
parameter.semantics: Specifies the total number of minefield records being published in response to a Minefield Query interaction

parameter.name: NumberTripDetonationWires
parameter.semantics: Specifies the number of trip detonation wires that exist for each mine

parameter.name: NumberWireVertices
parameter.semantics: Specifies the number of vertices for each trip wire

parameter.name: PaintScheme
parameter.semantics: Specifies the camouflage scheme/color of the mine

parameter.name: RecordSequenceNumber
parameter.semantics: Specifies the number of the current record in a sequence of minefield records published in response to a Minefield Query interaction

parameter.name: Reflectance
parameter.semantics: Specifies the local dielectric difference between the mine and the surrounding soil

parameter.name: RequestIdentifier
parameter.semantics: Identifies the matching response to a request for mine information from the minefield simulation made by means of a Minefield Query interaction

parameter.name: RequestingEntityIdentifier
parameter.semantics: Identifies the entity that requested the information from the minefield simulation in QRP (Query Response Protocol) mode

parameter.name: ScalarDetectionCoefficient
parameter.semantics: Specifies the coefficient to be utilized to insure proper correlation between detectors located on different simulation platforms

parameter.name: SensorTypes
parameter.semantics: In QRP mode, specifies the requesting sensor types which were specified in the minefield query whereas in Heartbeat mode, specifies the sensor types that are being served by the minefield

parameter.name: SnowBurialDepthOffset
parameter.semantics: Specifies the offset of the origin of the mine coordinate system with respect to the snow surface

parameter.name: ThermalContrast
parameter.semantics: Specifies the temperature difference between the mine and the surrounding soil in degrees Centigrade

parameter.name: WaterBurialDepthOffset
parameter.semantics: Specifies the offset of the origin of the mine coordinate system with respect to the water surface

parameter.name: WireVertices
parameter.semantics: Specifies the locations of vertices in a trip wire

interactionClass.name: MinefieldQuery
interactionClass.semantics: Provides the means by which a federate shall query a minefield simulation for information on the individual mines within the minefield operating in QRP mode.

parameter.name: MinefieldIdentifier
parameter.semantics: Identifies the minefield to which this query is addressed

parameter.name: PerimeterPoints
parameter.semantics: Specifies the location of each perimeter point in the requested area relative to the minefield location

parameter.name: QueryFusing
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not fusing is requested

parameter.name: QueryMineOrientation
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not orientation is requested

parameter.name: QueryGroundBurialDepthOffset
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not ground burial depth offset is requested

parameter.name: QueryMineEmplacementAge
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not emplacement age is requested

parameter.name: QueryPaintScheme
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not paint scheme is requested

parameter.name: QueryReflectance
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not reflectance is requested

parameter.name: QueryScalarDetectionCoefficient
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not scalar detection coefficient is requested

parameter.name: QuerySnowBurialDepthOffset
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not snow burial depth offset is requested

parameter.name: QueryThermalContrast
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not thermal contrast is requested

parameter.name: QueryTripDetonationWire
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not trip detonation wire is requested

parameter.name: QueryWaterBurialDepthOffset
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not water burial depth offset is requested

parameter.name: RequestingEntityIdentifier
parameter.semantics: Identifies the entity that requests the information from the minefield simulation

parameter.name: RequestIdentifier
parameter.semantics: Identifies the minefield query request

parameter.name: RequestedMineType
parameter.semantics: Identifies the type of mine being queried by the requesting federate

parameter.name: SensorTypes
parameter.semantics: Specifies the types of sensors requesting the data

interactionClass.name: MinefieldResponseNACK
interactionClass.semantics: A response to a MinefieldQuery providing information on individual mines within a minefield.

parameter.name: MinefieldIdentifier
parameter.semantics: Identifies the minefield to which this query is addressed

parameter.name: MissingRecordNumbers
parameter.semantics: Specifies the record numbers that were not received in a sequence of minefield records

parameter.name: RequestIdentifier
parameter.semantics: Identifies the minefield query request

parameter.name: RequestingEntityIdentifier
parameter.semantics: Identifies the entity that requested the information from the minefield simulation

interactionClass.name: MinefieldObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent to an environment manager to request the creation, modification, or deletion of instances of the MinefieldObject class.

parameter.name: BreachedStatus
parameter.semantics: Specifies the breached appearance of the minefield object

parameter.name: MineCount
parameter.semantics: Specifies the number of mines in the minefield

interactionClass.name: MinefieldLaneMarkerObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent to an environment manager to request the creation, modification, or deletion of instances of the MinefieldLaneMarkerObject class.

parameter.name: SegmentRecords
parameter.semantics: Specifies a minefield lane marker linear object

simpleData.name: MineDielectricDifference
simpleData.semantics: Local dielectric difference between the mine and the surrounding soil (reflectance)

arrayData.name: DepthMeterFloat32LengthlessArray
arrayData.semantics: Specifies ground - snow - water burial depth offset for each mine in a collection of mines

arrayData.name: MineDielectricDifferenceLengthlessArray
arrayData.semantics: Specifies local dielectric difference between the mine and the surrounding soil (reflectance) for each mine in a collection of mines

arrayData.name: MinefieldLaneMarkerStructLengthlessArray
arrayData.semantics: Specifies a minefield lane marker (a collection of segments)

arrayData.name: MinefieldPaintSchemeLengthlessArray
arrayData.semantics: Specifies the camouflage scheme/color for each mine in a collection of mines

arrayData.name: MinefieldSensorTypeLengthlessArray
arrayData.semantics: Specifies a collection of minefield sensor types

arrayData.name: MineFusingStructLengthlessArray
arrayData.semantics: Specifies the type of primary fuse, the type of the secondary fuse and the anti-handling device status for a collection of mines

arrayData.name: MineIdentifierLengthlessArray
arrayData.semantics: Identifies the mine entity identifier for each mine in a collection of mines

arrayData.name: MissingRecordNumbersLengthlessArray1Plus
arrayData.semantics: Specifies missing record numbers as a collection

arrayData.name: PerimeterPointStructLengthlessArray
arrayData.semantics: Specifies the location of perimeter points (collection)

arrayData.name: TemperatureDegreeCelsiusFloat32LengthlessArray
arrayData.semantics: Specifies thermal contrast for each mine in a collection of mines

fixedRecordData.name: MinefieldLaneMarkerStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Record specifying a minefield lane marker segment

field.name: SegmentParameters
field.semantics: Specifies the minefield lane marker segment characteristics

field.name: VisibleSideLocation
field.semantics: Specifies the visible side(s) of the minefield lane marker segment

fixedRecordData.name: MineFusingStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Record specifying the type of primary fuse, the type of the secondary fuse and the anti-handling device status of a mine

field.name: Primary
field.semantics: Specifies the type of the primary fuse of a mine

field.name: Secondary
field.semantics: Specifies the type of the secondary fuse of a mine

field.name: AntiHandlingDevice
field.semantics: Specifies the anti-handling device status of a mine

fixedRecordData.name: PerimeterPointStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Record specifying the location of a perimeter point

note.label: RPRnoteMinefield5
note.semantics: Required if tripwires are used, otherwise the default value is Empty

note.label: RPRnoteMinefield6
note.semantics: Required if the sum of values in NumberTripDetonationWires is greater than 0, otherwise the default value is Empty

note.label: RPRnoteMinefield7
note.semantics: Required if the sum of values in NumberWireVertices is greater than 0, otherwise the default values is Empty

note.label: RPRnoteMinefield11
note.semantics: Default value: Minefield Location (not needed for single mines)

note.label: RPRnoteMinefield13
note.semantics: Breached appearance for point objects and areal objects has values 0: no breaching, 1: breached and 2: cleared, with respect to the DIS standard as defined in SISO-REF-010 (section 12.1.2.2.2 & 12.1.2.4.1) ; this has to be taken into account when setting up a DIS-HLA gateway (SDEM mapping and filtering)

note.label: RPRnoteMinefield14
note.semantics: All padding fields shall be set to the value 0
